attributes.action: For all key workers to have their holidays day reset after the covid-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: I trust that the government respect and really do appreciate all the hard work we have done over the last few weeks but this would just br a good gesture from the government they selfs, I think not only would it raise all key workers moral it would really show we are being looked after. Its hard to work in this time knowing people still meeting up and making this longer but are still getting paid and treating it as holidays
attributes.background: To speak to the company and the NHS about how hard is key workers have all worked throughout the whole pandemic how we have had people getting paid at home while we all still risk our selfs to keep those who still go outside and meet friends and who go to the beach and are still getting paid while

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for employers, not the UK Parliament or Government.

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
